classic.name: Bryggen
classic.description: A medieval wharf in the historic harbor district known for its colorful, wooden-clad boat houses.

classic.name: Festplassen
classic.description: Recreational piazza overlooking Bergen's central lake & fountain, site of fun fairs & festivals.

classic.name: Troldhaugen
classic.description: Former villa of the famous composer with a museum containing concert spaces & his personal effects.

classic.name: VilVite - Bergen Science Center
classic.description: Modern, glass-fronted science center with interactive exhibits for kids, workshops & 3D film shows.

classic.name: Gamlehaugen
classic.description: Historic royal castle with a surrounding park, popular for outdoor sports, swimming & sledding.

classic.name: Gamle Bergen Museum - Bymuseet i Bergen
classic.description: Open-air museum with historic wooden buildings, actors in costume & theatrical performances.

classic.name: Bergen Maritime Museum
classic.description: Founded in 1914, this museum contains ships, boats, artifacts & films about Norway's seafaring past.

classic.name: Bergenhus Fortress
classic.description: Waterfront, stone-built fortress with 13th-century origins & a museum about Bergen during WWII.

classic.name: Akvariet i Bergen - The National Aquarium
classic.description: Tropical fish, seals & sea lion shows in an aquarium with penguin feeding & crocodiles.

classic.name: Fantoft Stave Church
classic.description: Early medieval wooden church, built in the village of Fortun & moved here, with carved dragon heads.

classic.name: Bryggens Museum - Bymuseet i Bergen
classic.description: Excavated city artifacts exhibited in a small, contemporary building with a gift shop & cafe.

classic.name: Håkonshallen - Bymuseet i Bergen
classic.description: Grand, 3-story royal residence & banquet hall from the 13th century, still in use for events.

classic.name: Bergen University Museum - Natural History
classic.description: University natural history museum with botany, geology & zoology exhibits, plus cultural displays.

classic.name: Kode Art Museum - Lysverket
classic.description: Art museum with paintings by Munch, Astrup, Dahl & other Norwegians, plus work by Picasso.
